# Overview

This is my first attempt to create the coursework website.

## Getting started


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```
:::


# The Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exam_data <- read_csv("C:/Users/jiayi/Documents/SMU/26 Jan Term/ISSS608 Visual Analytics and Applications/17.1.26/data/Exam_data.csv")
```
:::


# First Visualization


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.7.1
ggplot(data = exam_data,
       aes(x = RACE)) +
  geom_bar()  
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.7.2
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_dotplot(dotsize = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_dotplot(binwidth=2.5,         
               dotsize = 0.5) +      
  scale_y_continuous(NULL,           
                     breaks = NULL)  
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-3.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.7.3#
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram() 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-4.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.7.4#
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20,            
                 color="black",      
                 fill="light blue")  
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-5.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.7.5
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           fill = GENDER)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20, 
                 color="grey30")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-6.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.7.6
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_density()           
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-7.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS, 
           colour = GENDER)) +
  geom_density()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-8.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.7.7
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS,       
           x= GENDER)) +    
  geom_boxplot()            
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-9.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, 
           x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot(notch=TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-10.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.7.8
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, 
           x= GENDER)) +
  geom_violin()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-11.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.7.9
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point()            
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-12.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.7.10
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, 
           x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +                    
  geom_point(position="jitter", 
             size = 0.5)        
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-13.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.8.1
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-14.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.8.2
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  stat_summary(geom = "point",       
               fun = "mean",         
               colour ="red",        
               size=4)               
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-15.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.8.3
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_point(stat="summary",        
             fun="mean",           
             colour="red",          
             size=4)                    
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-16.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.8.4
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(size=0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-17.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              linewidth=0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-18.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.9.1
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
  facet_wrap(~ CLASS)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-19.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.9.2
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
  facet_grid(~ CLASS)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-20.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.10.1
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-21.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.10.2
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              size=0.5) +  
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(0,100),
                  ylim=c(0,100))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-22.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#1.11.1
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_classic()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-23.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_minimal()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](HE01_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-24.png){width=672}
:::
:::
